title: Go Tell It on the Mountain - passage is primarily

content.question: The passage is primarily concerned with

choices.label: John's attitude toward the Sunday service
John's theories about the power of the Lord
the impact of music on John's church
the role of John's church in his future

content.answer: John's attitude toward the Sunday service

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
